title: Executive Order 7785-Amendment of Executive Order No. 6928 of December 24, 1934
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of March 26, 1934, ch. 87, 48 Stat. 466, section 4 of Executive Order No. 6928 of December 24, 1934, prescribing regulations for payment of losses sustained by officers, enlisted men, and employees of the United States in foreign countries on account of appreciation of foreign currencies in their relation to the American dollar, is hereby amended by changing the basic rate applicable to the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics from "51.74" to "5.75".
This order shall be effective as of July 1, 1937.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7785-Amendment of Executive Order No. 6928 of December 24, 1934 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362872
